description:
Rankin & Gregory - Leola, Pennsylvania, Personal Injury And Workers' Compensation Lawyers

From offices located in Leola, Rankin & Gregory provides personal injury and workers' compensation litigation services for clients in state and federal courts in Lancaster County and counties throughout eastern Pennsylvania. Founding attorneys Chad Rankin and Bill Gregory offer clients the benefit of more than 20 years of combined experience and courtroom success.

At Rankin & Gregory, you will work directly with your lawyer and will have the advantage of drawing on the knowledge and experience of the team. Every case is prepared for trial and the attorneys have a proven record of results in court. However, you will not be pressured into bringing your claim to a jury trial. Clients are empowered with the knowledge they need to make decisions about accepting a settlement or pursuing a jury verdict.

The firm has the professional capacity and financial resources to represent clients in complex personal injury and wrongful death litigation cases resulting from:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Slip-and-fall accidents and injuries resulting from a dangerous property
  • Injuries from assault, insufficient security
  • Accidents caused by defective and dangerous products
  • Injuries caused by medical negligence

Backed by the highest levels of client service from an exceptional staff, Rankin & Gregory have earned a reputation for excellence. The attorneys are dedicated and focused on helping clients recover the full and fair monetary compensation they are entitled. The firm offers a free case evaluation and handles personal injury and wrongful death litigation cases on a contingency fee basis. You pay no attorneys' fees if you do not recover monetary damages in a settlement or jury verdict.
